original_body_lines: After their centenary celebrations, last year, the Peterites still seem to be in the mood to celebrate.The next big scene is their Peterite Concert Stag Night, to be held on 27th April, at St. Peter’s College grounds, Bambalabitiya.Music will be by Flow, featuring Lahiru and Tachini, and many more guest artistes.Other highlights will include a dance performance by Gayan Srimal, and a fireworks display.
